abstract: GE Commercial Finance and Allied Capital, seeking to fill a gap left by troubled investment banks, have formed a $3.6 billion fund to finance private equity deals. The fund will finance commitments up to $500 million for borrowers across a range of industries, including healthcare, media, energy, aerospace, business services and transportation.
lead_paragraph: GE Commercial Finance and Allied Capital, seeking to fill a gap left by troubled investment banks, have formed a $3.6 billion fund to finance private equity deals. The fund will finance commitments up to $500 million for borrowers across a range of industries, including healthcare, media, energy, aerospace, business services and transportation.

headline.main: G.E. and Allied Launch Buyout Loan Fund
